projects.name: Personal Site
projects.description: This very site! A simple site to list off some of my work and some space for a blog. Simple reactjs site hosted on Amazon S3.

projects.name: Classroom Quiz Application
projects.description: An applicaion used by teachers/ lecturers to allow students to answer questions and display those responses in real time. Built with web sockets to achieve this.

projects.name: TalkTalk Web Component Library
projects.description: Part of the team at TalkTalk that built this project at TalkTalk. A library design to allow quick and easy reuse of visual components across multiple technology stacks. The speedcheck page is built entirely using web components.

projects.name: TalkTalk Sales CMS
projects.description: Using Contentful as a headless CMS I was part of the team that implemented the use of the CMS across TT's main site. The aim was to decrease the time to edit content and remove the need for developers to perform those changes.

projects.name: Cornwalls Cottages
projects.description: Lead developer of this project whilst working at Gloversure, a site for renting cottages. Noteworthy is the search page, built in React, so that users can search ineractively via a map or via normal search filters.
